q: lawmakers who were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room when she opened her eyes were three of her close female friends in Congress: House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi of California, Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. The doctors couldn't believe it, Debbie Wasserman Schultz later told CNN. "It was the most incredible experience that I have ever had." Gabrielle Giffords is expected to survive, although her condition and the extent of her recovery remain in doubt.

Google's challenges are visible on the horizon and it's likely that new blood, a new perspective, is needed, he said. Eric Schmidt will step down as the CEO of Google in April, the company announced today via official blog post. Mr. Eric Schmidt will remain executive chairman and serve as adviser to Mr. Page and Sergey Brin , the other company co-founder and its president of technology, reports the New York Times. But tech blogger Owen Thomas tells a more nuanced story. Thomas points out that "Page was Google's first CEO, and held the job from 1998 to 2001,

He will now be traveling across the state to listen and learn about how Hoosiers think we might best contribute in the years ahead. That begins Friday. Mike Pence , who flew today to Indiana from Washington, is holding a town hall meeting in Pendleton at 10 a.m. and speaking to Muncie Central High School students at 1:20 p.m.

" Comment on this Article Though Dermot O'Leary admits he enjoys working with Simon Cowell , he and the rest of the people who work with the music mogul hate to let him down. He added: Don't get me wrong, he's still my boss, but he's sort of a Victorian father- you'd hate to let him down. On the occasion that happens I literally feel sick. While Dermot O'Leary would love to continue working with Simon Cowell by taking a role on the US' X Factor' he is trying not to worry about it.

TV the music mogul said: "I haven't been invited." When the presenter of The Today Show, Matt Lauer , asked if he thought he would get an invite in the future he said: No. But I'll probably be allowed to wave in the street. the Bobcats with Allen Iverson spraining his right ankle and Anthony Parker spraining his left wrist. Anthony Parker said he's sore but fine and will play Wednesday night at Portland. . "With the country running a$ 14 trillion national debt, my goal is to provide as much transparency as possible about what is happening with taxpayer money," Mr. Sen. Bernie Sanders said. The sad truth is that virtually all of the major defense contractors in this country for years have been engaged in systemic fraudulent behavior, while receiving hundreds of billions of dollars of taxpayer money. respected-- even as they disagreed on the issues-- Barack Obama Tom Coburn , R-Okla. Kirsten Gillibrand said Friday that she will sit on the Republican side of the House floor next to Barack Obama John Thune , R-S.D. This is just a symbol, but it sends an important message that although we may disagree on various issues, we all stand ready to work together and do what we believe is right for the country, Kirsten Gillibrand said in a statement.
